EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-11-14 Know Before You Go AWS ReInvent.ES-20181029-Invite Send 1.Subject
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Invitation | AWS re:Invent: Know Before You Go
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/aws-reinvent-wbn/]]> Register Now and Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/aws-reinvent-wbn/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
At AWS re:Invent this year, you can expect 50,000 attendees, thousands of sessions, hundreds of opportunities for hands on-learnings, and only 5 days to accomplish it all. It's easy to get overwhelmed but go in with the right information, and you'll walk out victorious.
Whether you're attending in person or online, please join us for a live webinar on Wednesday, November 14th at 11 a.m. ET <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/aws-reinvent-wbn]]>, with 3x veteran attendee and community blogger, Eric Wright, as he shares top tips for a successful re:Invent.
Reserve Your Seat <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/aws-reinvent-wbn]]>
In this live 30-minute live webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/aws-reinvent-wbn]]>, you will get the inside scoop on where to go when, how to watch virtually, what are must-see sessions, who to meet, and more. All registered guests will be entered to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card.
I hope to see you there!
Regards, Andrew
PS. In the meantime, check out this on-demand webcast "AWS or Azure? <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/aws-reinvent-wbn]]>" to learn how to make a data-driven decision on which cloud is right for your applications and budget.
